results.name: Sum of terms in n-th row of A077316.
comment: It appears that a(n) is also the smallest sum of n distinct primes of the form n*k+1. - Omar E. Pol, Sep 03 2011
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Nov 04 2002
